video.title: Fringe
video.synopsis: As part of Fringe Division, FBI agent Olivia Dunham uses experimental science to unravel the mystery surrounding a series of paranormal events.

episodes.synopsis: When an international flight lands at Boston's Logan Airport with no signs of life aboard, special agent Olivia Dunham is called in to investigate.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The trio investigates the mysterious death of a woman who conceives, carries to full term and then births a baby in the span of hours.
episodes.title: The Same Old Story

episodes.synopsis: The unlikely trio investigates a horrific bus incident in which the dead bodies of commuters are frozen inside a bus like insects in amber.
episodes.title: The Ghost Network

episodes.synopsis: After a deadly explosion rocks a construction site, a mysterious cylinder is found at the scene unharmed by the surrounding devastation.
episodes.title: The Arrival

episodes.synopsis: When it's discovered that a rather simple man has the ability to harness electricity, dangerous and deadly occurrences follow.
episodes.title: Power Hungry

episodes.synopsis: A woman with a rare disease inexplicably causes excruciating pain and subsequent death to those she encounters.
episodes.title: The Cure

episodes.synopsis: Every second counts when a strange, almost otherworldly parasite mysteriously attaches itself to the internal organs of a dying FBI agent.
episodes.title: In Which We Meet Mr. Jones

episodes.synopsis: When a child music prodigy is abducted by a serial kidnapper, it's discovered that a sequence of flashing lights appeared at the abduction.
episodes.title: The Equation

episodes.synopsis: A Massive Dynamic employee is so convinced he is being attacked by butterflies that he jumps out of a window to escape them.
episodes.title: The Dreamscape

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a series of bank robberies, Olivia, Walter and Peter find one of the suspects inexplicably trapped inside a vault wall.
episodes.title: Safe

episodes.synopsis: One of Olivia's former adversaries is called in by Internal Affairs to conduct a formal review of the Fringe Division.
episodes.title: Bound

episodes.synopsis: Olivia, Walter and Peter are called in to investigate the death of a car salesman who was found in a pool of "goo."
episodes.title: The No-Brainer

episodes.synopsis: When the Fringe Division delves into another bizarre occurrence aboard an international jumbo jet, freakish remains are discovered at the crash site.
episodes.title: The Transformation

episodes.synopsis: German agents question Olivia about her "relationship" with David Robert Jones, an escaped prisoner questioned months earlier.
episodes.title: Ability

episodes.synopsis: Just seconds before a building is demolished, a mysterious mute child who has been living alone underground is discovered.
episodes.title: Inner Child

episodes.synopsis: As animal rights activists ransack a laboratory, they get more than they bargained for when one of the caged "animals" unleashes a ferocious appetite.
episodes.title: Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: As a suicide incident occurs at New York's Grand Central station, Agent Dunham simultaneously witnesses the event while asleep and dreaming in Boston.
episodes.title: Bad Dreams

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe Division is on the case when severely mutilated bodies drained of spinal cord fluid begin to pile up.
episodes.title: Midnight

episodes.synopsis: Olivia experiences "awake dreams," seeing elaborate visions of things that aren't really there.
episodes.title: The Road Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: Setting the stage for the Season 1 finale are the return of bioterrorist David Robert Jones and the inexplicable disappearance of Walter.
episodes.title: There's More Than One of Everything

episodes.synopsis: A mother takes her brain-dead teenage daughter off life support, but when doctors operate quickly to remove her organs, the girl awakens, screaming.
episodes.title: Unearthed

episodes.synopsis: Season 2 opens with Olivia's shocking return to the alternate universe, while Peter pursues information about Olivia's visit.
episodes.title: A New Day in the Old Town

episodes.synopsis: As the circumstances surrounding Olivia intensify, the Fringe team investigates a perplexing case involving genetic mutation.
episodes.title: Night of Desirable Objects

episodes.synopsis: Peter, Walter, Olivia and Broyles pursue a deadly occurrence in which a bomb blew up inside a train station but left no trace of any explosive device.
episodes.title: Fracture

episodes.synopsis: Recuperating from the meeting with William Bell, Olivia consumes a powerful "fringe" concoction that Dr. Bishop prescribes to stimulate her memory.
episodes.title: Momentum Deferred

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team travels to Seattle to investigate a case involving a man who attacked his boss because he believed he was an evil ram-horned creature.
episodes.title: Dream Logic

episodes.synopsis: New light is shed on Agent Broyles as the Fringe team takes on a puzzling investigation where victims are inexplicably disintegrating into ash.
episodes.title: Earthling

episodes.synopsis: When a kidnapping escalates into a hostage situation, local authorities close in on the suspects only to discover a mysterious mind-blowing force.
episodes.title: Of Human Action

episodes.synopsis: When one of the mysterious Observers kidnaps a woman, the Fringe team is called in to investigate why.
episodes.title: August

episodes.synopsis: After a cargo ship runs aground, the shoreline is littered with bodies hosting a giant squid-like creature. The Fringe team investigates the scene.
episodes.title: Snakehead

episodes.synopsis: A Fringe investigation is triggered when a patient at a mental institution undergoes an impromptu surgery that unexpectedly leaves his brain exposed.
episodes.title: Grey Matters

episodes.synopsis: Following an attack involving disfigured humans, the Fringe team visits a town in upstate New York to uncover leads surrounding the bizarre case.
episodes.title: Johari Window

episodes.synopsis: In an office building, a man collapses and his veins erupt and spray blood everywhere. It's soon discovered that a lethal virus is spreading.
episodes.title: What Lies Below

episodes.synopsis: When a group of guests at a wedding suffocate from the inside out, the crime scene has the Fringe team investigating how the toxin was delivered.
episodes.title: The Bishop Revival

episodes.synopsis: After a violent tremor shakes a Manhattan office building, only one survivor is found, leading the Fringe team to believe he is not from this reality.
episodes.title: Jacksonville

episodes.synopsis: While explaining Peter's otherworldly origins to Olivia, Walter flashes back to 1985 and the mystery springs forward by revealing the past.
episodes.title: Peter

episodes.synopsis: When a healthy woman is found dead from a disease she never had, the Fringe team investigates the origin of this inexplicably fatal condition.
episodes.title: Olivia. In the Lab. With the Revolver

episodes.synopsis: When passengers aboard a commuter train appear to have died a still death, it seems all batteries and human bodies have been drained of power.
episodes.title: White Tulip

episodes.synopsis: When two teenagers turn up "dead" at an abandoned warehouse with three puncture wounds to the soft palate, the Fringe team investigates the evidence.
episodes.title: The Man from the Other Side

episodes.synopsis: While Walter deals with some upsetting news, he tells Olivia's niece a fairy tale that includes musical performances by Olivia and Agent Broyles.
episodes.title: Brown Betty

episodes.synopsis: Peter teams up with a local law enforcement official, Sheriff Mathis, on a serial murder investigation with ties to Thomas Jerome Newton.
episodes.title: Northwest Passage

episodes.synopsis: Walter and Olivia travel to the parallel universe, and the anticipated face-off between Walter and William Bell occurs.
episodes.title: Over There: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, sacrifices will be made and both universes may never be the same again after Walter and Olivia visit the "other side."
episodes.title: Over There: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A disoriented Olivia fights to find her way home, and we are introduced to her mother. Meanwhile, Peter and Walter try to move on with their lives.
episodes.title: Olivia

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team investigates a case where people are discovered in a trancelike state that ultimately leads to their death.
episodes.title: The Box

episodes.synopsis: A series of anomalous events leads the Fringe Division to investigate deadly incidents with unimaginable coincidences.
episodes.title: The Plateau

episodes.synopsis: Concerned about the consequences of a development involving a high-ranking official, Newton is forced to call to action a sleeping shapeshifter.
episodes.title: Do Shapeshifters Dream of Electric Sheep?

episodes.synopsis: The alternate universe Fringe Division investigates a shocking breach of security when a twin frees his brother from a quarantined Amber area.
episodes.title: Amber 31422

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team investigates a phenomenon in which 15 people suffer retrograde amnesia from listening to their shortwave radios on the same frequency.
episodes.title: 6955 kHz

episodes.synopsis: When a serial kidnapper strikes again, the case hits home for Col. Broyles, who sends Olivia to uncover additional details about the abductions.
episodes.title: The Abducted

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team discovers a critical device that communicates between universes. Meanwhile, Peter grapples with the aftermath of recent events.
episodes.title: Entrada

episodes.synopsis: When the Fringe team investigates a case in which a victim had his heart extracted, it's just the beginning of a series of linked reanimating events.
episodes.title: Marionette

episodes.synopsis: An Observer makes contact with the Fringe team to help rectify a mistake. Meanwhile, Walter befriends Roscoe Joyce, one of his musical heroes.
episodes.title: The Firefly

episodes.synopsis: When the Fringe team visits Massive Dynamic's assembly of the doomsday device, Walter becomes greatly concerned for Peter's well-being.
episodes.title: Reciprocity

episodes.synopsis: When a scientist dies after ingesting a lethal cloud of blue powder and his bones disintegrate in his body, the CDC suspects a biological attack.
episodes.title: Concentrate and Ask Again

episodes.synopsis: The absence of Col. Broyles shifts the dynamic of the Fringe team as they investigate a bioterrorist armed with a flesh-eating insect.
episodes.title: Immortality

episodes.synopsis: Events lead the team to a woman grieving over the death of her husband, while Peter and Olivia make an effort to repair the rift between them.
episodes.title: 6B

episodes.synopsis: The team revisits the past in this follow-up to last season's "Peter" episode that reveals a poignant period of time for the Bishops and Olivia.
episodes.title: Subject 13

episodes.synopsis: What goes up may not always come down when the Fringe team investigates a group of thieves who can break the laws of gravity.
episodes.title: Os

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team investigates an apparent suicide victim. Uncovering a second set of fingerprints, they are led to a woman who cannot die.
episodes.title: Stowaway

episodes.synopsis: The intensity of life "over there" accelerates as Olivia finds herself in mortal danger.
episodes.title: Bloodline

episodes.synopsis: Using lab experimentation, the team makes a desperate attempt to remove William Bell's consciousness from Olivia's body before she's lost forever.
episodes.title: Lysergic Acid Diethylamide

episodes.synopsis: The beginning of the end is triggered when Walternate finds a way to wreak havoc "over here" -- putting both universes in jeopardy.
episodes.title: 6:02 AM EST

episodes.synopsis: Olivia joins forces with the mysterious Sam Weiss in a desperate race against time.
episodes.title: The Last Sam Weiss

episodes.synopsis: As the third season propels itself to its close, questions will be answered as Peter confronts his destiny and a team member meets an untimely demise.
episodes.title: The Day We Died

episodes.synopsis: Just one week after Peter Bishop saved the day and was then wiped from existence, the truce between the two worlds remains intact.
episodes.title: Neither Here Nor There

episodes.synopsis: As the victims of a highly intelligent serial killer "Over There" stack up, the Fringe Division "Over Here" is asked to assist.
episodes.title: One Night in October

episodes.synopsis: After two kids bully another boy, they are found dead. Just hours after dying, their bodies are shockingly in an advanced state of decomposition.
episodes.title: Alone in the World

episodes.synopsis: Olivia uncovers a dangerous force that may be connected to Walter's past experiments with the drug Cortexiphan.
episodes.title: Subject 9

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of recent shocking events, things really escalate when the translucent shapeshifters return.
episodes.title: Novation

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team must find the pattern between tragic time loop anomalies.
episodes.title: And Those We've Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: When a man dies mysteriously, his body rapidly begins turning ghostly white. The Fringe team learns that this is not an isolated incident.
episodes.title: Wallflower

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to find a way home, Peter journeys to the Other Side to confront Walternate, a venture that proves more dangerous than expected.
episodes.title: Back to Where You've Never Been

episodes.synopsis: Peter's visit to the Other Side intensifies as the alternate Fringe division faces off against a formidable new foe in a harrowing race against time.
episodes.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Olivia continues to cope with the ominous warning from the Observers. Peter and the team track a girl who's able to see the future and predict death.
episodes.title: Forced Perspective

episodes.synopsis: Our Astrid gets an unexpected visit from her Alternate, while Peter and Olivia track a killer using a toxin that has yet to be invented.
episodes.title: Making Angels

episodes.synopsis: Peter, Olivia and Walter come face-to-face with a mysterious and terrifying Fringe event as they become trapped in a town there's no escaping from.
episodes.title: Welcome to Westfield

episodes.synopsis: As the Fringe team investigates a mentally ill patient linked to a series of murders, clues and connections lead Olivia to some shocking revelations.
episodes.title: A Better Human Being

episodes.synopsis: Peter and the Fringe team take extraordinary measures in an attempt to stop life-threatening events from unfolding.
episodes.title: The End of All Things

episodes.synopsis: Following the recent shocking revelations and emotional events, Peter weighs his options as the Fringe team investigates a killer targeting love.
episodes.title: A Short Story About Love

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team faces a case that appears familiar to Peter. Strangely, it takes place in this world.
episodes.title: Nothing as It Seems

episodes.synopsis: Lincoln travels to the other side to join forces with Bolivia and his own alternate as they search for a vigilante with a link to the shapeshifters.
episodes.title: Everything in its Right Place

episodes.synopsis: Walter travels to the Alternate Universe to help investigate a Fringe event with ties to both worlds. David Robert Jones reveals his next target.
episodes.title: The Consultant

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team goes back to the future. Jumping ahead to 2036, the Fringe team and the Observers engage in a game-changing battle.
episodes.title: Letters of Transit

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe teams on both sides fight for a common cause as the Cortexiphan children surface with some shocking new developments.
episodes.title: Worlds Apart

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious Fringe event forces Walter to revisit his painful past as the team faces off against David Robert Jones to save the world -- or worlds.
episodes.title: Brave New World: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the season 4 finale, the Fringe team is pushed to the breaking point as the team tries to prevent a catastrophy that threatens everyone.
episodes.title: Brave New World: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In the season premiere, the Fringe team -- released from their amber prison after 20 years -- joins the rebel group fighting for freedom.
episodes.title: Transilience Thought Unifier Model-11

episodes.synopsis: The Fringe team revisits Walter's former lab at Harvard to locate information they need to fight on against the Observer overlords.
episodes.title: In Absentia

episodes.synopsis: Unforeseen events lead the rogue Fringe team into a forest, where they encounter a subculture of people devoted to recording human history.
episodes.title: The Recordist

episodes.synopsis: When the Fringe team tracks a lead into a hostile and heavily guarded location, Phillip Broyles resurfaces. But can he be trusted?
episodes.title: The Bullet That Saved the World

episodes.synopsis: While the Fringe team responds to devastating events by going on the offensive, one of the key members makes a pivotal and shocking move.
episodes.title: An Origin Story

episodes.synopsis: As Walter follows leads to a key item needed to defeat the Observers, a member of the Fringe team takes on a new role.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass and What Walter Found There

episodes.synopsis: As the fight for the future intensifies, a member of the team orchestrates a game-changing Fringe event.
episodes.title: Five-Twenty-Ten

episodes.synopsis: As Olivia looks to recover a piece of equipment for Walter, she meets a highly intuitive woman. Meanwhile, Peter is in peril as he observes Windmark.
episodes.title: The Human Kind

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to recall his plan to defeat the Observers, Walter takes an LSD trip down memory lane in search of answers.
episodes.title: Black Blotter

episodes.synopsis: While scrambling to tap into a key piece of the puzzle to defeat the Observers, Peter, Olivia, Astrid and Walter ask Nina Sharp to help devise a plan.
episodes.title: Anomaly XB-6783746

episodes.synopsis: Walter enters the infamous deprivation tank in an attempt to uncover key information about the mysterious figure known as Donald.
episodes.title: The Boy Must Live

episodes.synopsis: To rescue Michael, Olivia embarks on a dangerous and otherworldly journey into the unknown.
episodes.title: Liberty

episodes.synopsis: In the epic series conclusion, Olivia, Peter, Walter, Astrid and Broyles face off against the Observers in a final battle to decide humankind's fate.
episodes.title: An Enemy of Fate
